Personal Life Date of Birth14 November 1996 (Thursday) Age (as of 2023) 27 Years BirthplaceBareilly, Uttar Pradesh, India Zodiac signScorpio NationalityIndian HometownBareilly Educational QualificationGraduate (Correspondence) ReligionIslam Food HabitNon-vegetarian HobbiesWatching TV, Dancing, Singing ControversyUnprofessional Behaviour on the Sets: Hiba stirred a controversy due to her unprofessional behaviour of the set of the television serial 'Meri Saasu Maa.' In May 2016, her co-actor Aanchal Khurana, in an interview, claimed that Hiba and actor Pearl V Puri's close relationship and unprofessional behaviour on set caused problems for the crew. When Hiba learned about this, she allegedly confronted Aanchal and exchanged heated words. The situation got so worse that the producers and director had to step in to resolve the matter. Some Lesser Known Facts About Hiba Nawab

Hiba Nawab wanted to be a lawyer when she was a child.

During her school days, she actively participated in extracurricular activities like dancing.

When she was 10 years old, she used to teach about 5-7 students without charging any fees.

She appeared as a child artist in television series like Zee TV’s ‘Saat Phere – Saloni Ka Safar’ (2008) and Sony SAB’s ‘Lo Ho Gayi Pooja Iss Ghar Ki’ (2009).

She has a habit of talking to her reflection in the mirror.

Hiba was diagnosed with asthma when she was a teenager.

Due to her sensitive skin, she avoids wearing accessories or jewellery when she is not on set.

Her role as ‘Anushka Atwal’ aka ‘Pampi’ in Channel [V] India’s television series ‘Crazy Stupid Ishq’ (2013) was appreciated by the audience. The role helped her form the foundation of a promising career.

She met actor Pearl V Puri on the sets of Zee TV’s television series ‘Meri Saasu Maa’ (2016). They soon became friends and reportedly started dating. They, however, allegedly lost touch after the show went off the air.

The producers of the series ‘Meri Saasu Maa’ were reported to be uncomfortable with Hiba and Pearl’s relationship as they would often lock themselves in the make-up room for hours and refuse to come out.

Hiba has worked in many other television series like Sony SAB’s ‘Jijaji Chhat Per Hain’ (2018-2020), Star Bharat’s ‘Woh To Hai Albelaa’ (2022-2023), and StarPlus’ ‘Jhanak’ (2023).

In 2018, she was ranked 19th on Times of India’s list of the 20 Most Desirable Women on TV.

She has also appeared in some music videos such as ‘Achha Ve Achha’ (2021), ‘Ishq Bezubaan’ (2022), and ‘Tu Mera Dil’ (2023).

Hiba is against doing intimate scenes and has turned down many web series offers because of it.

She is an avid animal lover and has a pet cat named Snowy.

She loves travelling and often shares her travelling experiences on social media.

She is a fitness enthusiast and regularly hits the gym.
